com.opendxl.client

Class DxlUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opendxl.client.DxlUtils

  • public class DxlUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for use by the DXL-related classes

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DxlUtils.WildcardCallback
      Callback that is invoked for each wildcard pattern found

    • Method Detail

      • throwWrappedException

        public static void throwWrappedException(java.lang.String message,
                                         java.lang.Exception ex)
                                  throws DxlException
        Wraps the specified exception as a DxlException with the specified message. If the incoming exception is already a DxlException, it is simply rethrown (no wrapping occurs).
        Parameters:
        message - The message for the exception
        ex - The exception to wrap
        Throws:
        DxlException - If a DXL exception occurs

      • iterateWildcards

        public static void iterateWildcards(DxlUtils.WildcardCallback cb,
                                    java.lang.String topic)
        Iterates the wildcards for the specified topic.

        NOTE: This only supports "#" wildcards (not "+").

        Parameters:
        cb - The callback to invoke for each wildcard
        topic - The topic
